title: Liberal party promises net-zero emissions by 2050
text:
Liberal party promises net-zero emissions by 2050

Economy 58 minutes ago (Sep 24, 2019 09:21)

© Reuters. Canada's Liberal party promises net-zero emissions by 2050 TORONTO, Sept 24 (Reuters) - Canada's Liberal party committed to net-zero emissions by 2050 if re-elected in next month's federal election, and will beat the current 2030 emissions goal with its plan, the party said in a release on Tuesday. The party will "help workers prepare for a clean energy transition," the release said.

Liberal party promises net-zero emissions by 2050
description: Liberal party promises net-zero emissions by 2050
